text: what I've done in the past is have the form redirect to itself (so it just refreshes the page) and check for the `submissionguid` query paremeter on page load. If the query parameter exists then you can do your animation. as long as you have a fast page, the refresh isn't noticeable
however, I'm not sure if the password form works in the same way
main reason why I did that was to give HubSpot a few seconds to populate the contact records for smart content.
Thank you for your reply! I'll check submissionguid

Hi there, I’m trying to check for country with this `{% if request.headers.cf-ipcountry == 'FR' %}`, but it’s dropping me this error `Cannot coerce 'FR' of class java.lang.String to class java.lang.Long (incompatible value)`. When I log `{{ request.headers.cf-ipcountry }}` it returns 0 instead of the country code as it does in the Developer Info. Any idea what I’m doing wrong here? Thanks!
